name: Crepes-party-hard-yolo-swag 2015
description:
A tiny game&watch like game made in a few weeks to teach CHICKEN Scheme to someone as well as teaching me how to properly finish a project, even a tiny one. ;)

It's very far from being serious but was really fun to make!

Graphics and music by @reptifur

Enjoy and share your score!

Feel free to leave us a tip if you want to see more games from us in the future.
